name: Christmas Decorations
description:
These decorations were all hand crafted by Mum :). A lot of time and care has gone into designing and creating these little charms. There are various styles and colours available:

- Gingerbread Angel
- Gingerbread Man
- Gingerbread Lady
- Christmas tree with buttons
- Christmas tree with beads & sequins
- Stockings: green or red
- Ice Skates

name: Vintage Button Necklace
description: These fab button necklaces come in various colours, with different sized buttons. Most of the buttons used have been handed down from generation to generation making them that little bit more special. If you would like any specifc colours or sizes please feel free to contact us.

name: Animal scarves!
description:
These scarves were handmade by Bon :).

We are now taking orders for this years animal scarves, which will be made and delivered in time for Christmas!

The scarves are made with fleece and felt, and are surface washable. There is a choice of; a Black Cat, White Rabbit, a Panda and our own inventions, the light blue Bonimal or green Frog. These scarves are around 155 - 160 cm long, however we can make them smaller for young children for around £6 (if you would like a toddler sized scarf please just contact us). Again, if you would like us to email you an image of the frog or bunny scarf please don't hesitate to contact us.  


For further images and other products please visit either our Myspace page at: www.myspace.com/bondesigns
Follow us with Twitter: www.twitter.com/bondesigns 
or search for us on Facebook: search for Bon

name: Twilight themed; *Eclipse* based Charm bracelet Edward/ Jacob
description: This charm bracelet is based on a bracelet described in the novel Eclipse by Stephanie Meyer. It was initially given as a gift by Jacob to Bella as a graduation present. It originally only contained a wolf charm, but Edward added a charm of his own, a faceted heart. This interpretation of the bracelet was designed exclusively by Bon, and it can be yours for £6 for a limited time only :). The charm base is silver plated, the wolf charm is made from Tibetan Silver and the heart is acrylic.

name: Handmade Cupcake Charm Bracelet
description: This cupcake lovers charm bracelet contains handmade polymer clay cupcake charms! Each charm has been carefully crafted and varnished by hand. The charm base is silver plated and hardwearing. These charm bracelets also contain a toothpaste charm, as a reminder to keep your teeth in good health after eatting cupcakes.
